name: pwv

body.origin:
|- wceq(cpw(universe), universe)
-| wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), universe))
-| diffsc(hs0, cpw(universe))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ P(𝕌)= 𝕌
⊣ (hs0 ∈ P(𝕌)↔ hs0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ d(hs0, P(𝕌))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(universe))
-| wss(cv(hs0), universe)
-| wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(universe)), wss(cv(hs0), universe))

⊢ hs0 ∈ P(𝕌)
⊣ hs0 ⊆ 𝕌
⊣ (hs0 ∈ P(𝕌)↔ hs0 ⊆ 𝕌)

comment: The power class of the universe is the universe. Exercise 4.12(d) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)
